entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
